Room.Name: Trantori's Summer Home
Room.ShortDescription: You are high over the forest in the summer home of the High Invoker.
Room.LongDescription: Windows are on every side, and there is a 360 degree view of the forest and the city of Oceancrest. In the middle of the room a crystal globe floats in mid-air, bobbing slightly on the air currents. A red robe is thrown across a comfortable chair, and a table nearby is littered with books of all sizes. The one that is open on top is an ancient, hand-written tome that must be at least half a meter in length. It's written in a language you do not understand.
